mapper.insert: insert into declaration( DECLARATION_NO, DECLARATION_TITLE, DECLARATION_WRITER, DECLARATION_RECEIVER, DECLARATION_REASON, DECLARATION_CONTENT, DECLARATION_DIVISION) values( seq_declaration_no.nextval, #{declarationTitle}, #{declarationWriter}, #{declarationReceiver}, #{declarationReason}, #{declarationContent}, #{declarationDivision} )
mapper.select: select * from declaration where declaration_deltype = 'N' order by declaration_no desc
